title: Cuban Randy Arozarena secures a millionaire salary for the upcoming MLB season
text:
Related videos:
The Cuban gardener [Randy Arozarena](https://en.cibercuba.com/tags/randy-arozarena) reached an important salary agreement with the Seattle Mariners, securing a contract worth 11.3 million dollars for the upcoming season of Major League Baseball ([MLB](https://en.cibercuba.com/tags/grandes-ligas-mlb)).
According to journalist Francys Romero on the social network [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/francysromerocuba/posts/pfbid06698Axycu7Vu9ncPK1e5UoyMYeqfHzG3nZFwNbnaKHDBX9RdCKeSpuZDW5fVXptZl), with this agreement, both parties avoided going to arbitration, strengthening the star player's position on the team.
Arozarena, who became a Mexican citizen, continues to make his mark in Major League Baseball. In 2024, the fiery athlete achieved for the fourth consecutive time the milestone of 20+ home runs and 20+ stolen bases, making him the only player born in Cuba to accomplish this feat. This performance positions him as one of the most dynamic and valuable players in the league.
A rising and established career..
Since his debut in 2019, Randy Arozarena has established himself as a star. His historic performance in the 2020 playoffs with the Tampa Bay Rays catapulted him to stardom.
Following his transfer to the Mariners last year, the outfielder demonstrated his [offensive and defensive impact](https://en.cibercuba.com/noticias/2024-09-15-u1-e197721-s27066-nid288478-randy-arozarena-conecta-hit-oro-decidir-victoria), becoming a key pillar of the team.
With a salary that reflects his performance and potential, the native of Pinar del Río will aim to be an important asset once again in leading the franchise into a new era of success in MLB, while continuing to set new standards for Cuban players in professional baseball.
Frequently Asked Questions about Randy Arozarena and His Impact on MLB
What is Randy Arozarena's new contract with the Seattle Mariners?
Randy Arozarena signed a contract for 11.3 million dollars for the upcoming season with the Seattle Mariners, thus avoiding arbitration and solidifying his position on the team.
What recent achievements has Randy Arozarena accomplished in the MLB?
Randy Arozarena has achieved for the fourth consecutive time the milestone of 20+ home runs and 20+ stolen bases, being the only player born in Cuba to reach this feat, which positions him as one of the most dynamic and valuable players in the league.
How has Randy Arozarena's transition been with the Seattle Mariners?
Since his transfer to the Mariners, Randy Arozarena has shown his impact both offensively and defensively, becoming a key pillar of the team. His performance has been crucial for the Mariners' aspirations in the MLB, and he aims to lead the franchise into a new era of success.
How has Randy Arozarena contributed off the field?
Randy Arozarena has shown his social commitment by bringing baseball to the Social Reintegration Center in Mérida, Yucatán, providing entertainment and hope to the inmates. This gesture reflects his gratitude and commitment to the community that welcomed him after leaving Cuba.
